question.text: Select the incorrect statement about reproductive health:

options.text: Nearly 45 to 50 millions MTPs are performed in a year all over the world.
Sexually transmitted diseases (STDs) are also called venereal diseases (VD).
The intra-cytoplasmic sperm injection, the technique involves in vitro fertilization.
Inability to conceive or produce children even after 9 months of unprotected sex is called sterility.

solution.text: Inability to conceive or produce children even after 2 years of unprotected sexual cohabitation is called infertility. The term infertility is not synonym of sterility, which means complete inability to produce offspring.
